distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for dovecot22 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-14461: dovecot22: rfc822_parse_domain (bsc#1082826)
  Information Leak Vulnerability
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A specially crafted email delivered over SMTP and passed on to Dovecot by MTA can trigger an out of bounds read resulting in potential sensitive information disclosure and denial of service. In order to trigger this vulnerability, an attacker needs to send a specially crafted email message to the server.
notes.title: CVE description
